Bury St Edmunds Mobile Library Route 7

Contact us:

Managers: Carl Bell and Kevin Lambert

Email: help@suffolklibraries.co.uk

Telephone: 01473 351249

Route timetable

Stop Village Location Time
7A Stanningfield Red House 0920 – 0945
7B Lawshall The Chapel 0950 – 1020
7C Lawshall Swanfields 1025 – 1040
7D Lawshall Village Hall 1045 – 1125
7E Alpheton Village Hall 1135 – 1155
7F Alpheton Tye Green 1200 – 1215
7G Acton Newmans Green 1335 – 1355
7H Acton Queensway 1400 – 1425
7I Great Waldingfield Coronation Rise 1435 – 1525
7J Little Waldingfield The Swan 1535 – 1550
7K Acton Canon Pugh Drive 1600 – 1620
7L Acton Babergh Close 1625 – 1645

Calling every 4 weeks on Thursdays:

2019: 19 December

2020: 16 January, 13 February, 12 March, 9 April, 7 May, 4 June, 2 July, 30 July, 27 August, 24 September, 22 October, 19 November, 17 December
